divs: sighting detailsfour orange sphere shape flying fast speed .no sound seem to be droping in a waving manner and descending down in steps. three spheres to the middle moving up and down. there were two satellites after sighting,one minute later that crossed over path in opposite direction. the second satellite maybe 20 min. later going in same flight path as ufos. i got nervous,all the hairs on my body stood up. i lost sight of ufos as they flew over neigghbor's house. this is the third time this month i have seen strange lights, oct.8 \08 4:00am saw small light just to the left of orion that became so big i leaned back and it blinded my eye for a secound and felt it in the back of my eye.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fullerton
There were no other sightings in Fullerton on or around October 22nd 2008
Summary: FOUR LITE ORANGE SPHERE SHAPE FLYING IN FORMATION ,NO SOUND MOVING FAST ,THIRD SPHERE TO MIDDLE MOVING UP AND DOWN ,GOING NORTH TOWARDS POMONA C.A.
